title: Culture Kindergarten Parents’ day to be held on 15 Jan 2024
body:
To all the parents and kids, please be aware that there’ll be no school for this coming Monday (8 Jan 2024) due to the public holiday in Kuala Lumpur area.

We understand the importance of family time, and we believe that such moments contribute significantly to the overall development and well-being of our young learners. Take this opportunity to engage in fun activities, share stories, and create lasting memories with your children.

Regular classes will resume on 9 Jan 2024 (Tue), and we look forward to welcoming our energetic and happy learners back to the kindergarten.

Thank you for your understanding, and we wish you a joyful and relaxing public holiday!

Best Regards,
Culture Kindergarten
